trans-unit.source: Searches for a specified file in a specified path

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: The name of the file for which to search.

seg-source.mrk: The name of the file for which to search.

target.mrk: The name of the file for which to search.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The path to be searched for the file. If this parameter is omitted or an empty string (Default), the function

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
The path to be searched for the file.
If this parameter is omitted or an empty string (Default), the function

target.mrk: [optional]
The path to be searched for the file.
If this parameter is omitted or an empty string (Default), the function

trans-unit.source: searches for a matching file using a registry-dependent system search path (see below).

seg-source.mrk: searches for a matching file using a registry-dependent system search path (see below).

target.mrk: searches for a matching file using a registry-dependent system search path (see below).

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: The path of the file found.

seg-source.mrk: The path of the file found.

target.mrk: The path of the file found.

trans-unit.source: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

target.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

trans-unit.source: If the path is an empty string, _WinAPI_SearchPath() searches for a matching file based on the current value
